comments:
When I try to create the compilation file from a plugin.xml or fragment.xml, 
using right-clic "cr?er le fichier de compilation ant", I get immediately a NPE 
message.

What's wrong with me ? (Unfortunately, I've not found exactly this NPE trouble 
in the database bugs.eclipse.org nor in eclipse/readme/readme_eclipse.html)

a) notice that the execution of Ant on a build.xml works well, so I believe 
having a good Ant'config

b) I use Eclipse 2.1.2, and Ant 1.5.3 from the Eclipse's plugin ; my platform : 
Windows 2000 (same problem with XP)

c) Here is extract of the .log
